bug_report.title: Incorrect URL Endpoint Displayed After Selecting Veranda Blend Coffee in 44 Pods

steps_to_reproduce.step: In the 'Flavor' section, click on 'View all 24'.
Click on the button Veranda Blend.
In the 'Count Per Pack' section, select '44'.

bug_report.expected_result: The URL endpoint should be updated to reflect the selected product and display the correct count of pods.
bug_report.actual_result: After selecting Veranda Blend coffee with 44 pods, the URL endpoint still refers to the Vanilla Light Roast K-Cup Coffee with 22 pods instead of updating to the selected coffee.
